data.title: V3.8: winrt project file fixes

milestone.title: v3.8
milestone.description:
This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.body:
This pull request updated the C++ debug info to correctly generate .pdb files for all cocos2d-x projects. 
This pull request also fixes a crash if the DirectX device is lost. The rendering surface was not being made current after a graphics device reset.

data.title: Request: Bitmap Fonts support for the Button in CocosStudio
data.body:
Cocos runtime allows to assign a bitmap fonts for the button caption.
But there is no corresponding option in Cocos Studio and we are only able to assign TTF fonts to the button. It would be great to add this feature.

data.title: NotificationNode is not entered and exited.
data.body:
When setting notification node using Director::setNotificationNode, the target node's onEnter haven't been called. When old notification node replaced by new one, it's onExit haven't been called neither.

The consequence is that the notification node can't be scheduled. And action won't take effect neither

data.body:
tolua no update anymore since Feb 2012.
swig keep update.
what is the bigest reason select to lua?

data.title: Scene Graph Listener should only receive Events for the node's camera
iOS possible issue: proper place to Director::stop/startAnimation
data.body:
As i know on iOS app should not perform any work with OpenGL after call of _applicationWillResignActive_.

If i understood correctly, work with opengl in cocos stopped and resumed by:

```
Director::getInstance()->stopAnimation();
Director::getInstance()->startAnimation();
```

But these method called respectively by:

```
- (void)applicationDidEnterBackground:(UIApplication *)application;
- (void)applicationWillEnterForeground:(UIApplication *)application;
```

But _applicationDidEnterBackground_ called after a small delay after _applicationWillResignActive_. So it may be too late to stop use OpenGL.

Also, when user receive a call, double click home button or buying IAP - _applicationWillResignActive_ always called, but _applicationDidEnterBackground_ may not be called. And i think the game should be paused in these situations.

Previously i have worked with SpriteKit and it crushed on iOS 7 if not to call SKView.pause() in _applicationWillResignActive_. Seems like i have received similar crash reports in cocos2d-x in iOS 7 (unfortunately i don't have iOS 7 device and can't reproduce these issues on simulator).

data.title: [3.8] ListView has wrong behaviour by default

milestone.title: v3.8
milestone.description:
This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.body:
In cpp-tests the listview shows the last items by default , so the user has to scroll up everytime to see the top items. The behaviour should be the other way around and should show the top items first.

This is shown when opening the UIListViewTest:
![wrong](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4009589/9358991/29876848-468f-11e5-8ac2-77263531746f.PNG)

This should be shown instead:
![right](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4009589/9359011/402c6f26-468f-11e5-92de-c6267d7df4e5.PNG)

data.body:
Default transparent value of rendercommand is true.
It should be opaque. So that it can be drawn before transparent objects.

data.title: [WEB-Canvas] Sprite setColor generates cache canvas and create chaos in updating logic
Fixed #12570: Correct `cc.pIsSegmentIntersect` for lua
Optimize the bindings-generator tool
data.body:
- [ ] Should support lambda in Lua bindings (@dualface can you take a look) 
- [ ] The return value is Object value, it would trigger the compile error.
- [ ] If the functions of class are limited by the macro, the binding function have get the macro limit.
- [ ] Make tools search the dependent library path automatically
- [ ] Make the enum class be generated automatically (Configurable)
- [ ] Add record of deprecated functions
- [ ] Record the binding function that have parse error
- [ ] Should support the include conversional heads files of different module by configure

Migrated from: https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/9958
